greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Nearest integer to A001055(n)/A045778(n), where A001055 is factorizations and A045778 is strict factorizations.
comment: A factorization of n is a finite, nondecreasing sequence of positive integers > 1 with product n. It is strict if the factors are all different.
xref: The same for integer partitions is A330996 ~ A330994/A330995.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jan 10 2020
